title: El Perro (Bombon El Perro) [2004] DvDrip-paTon
description:
El Perro (Bombon El Perro) [2004] DvDrip-paTon

Director: Carlos Sorin
Writers: Santiago Calori - Salvador Roselli
Genre: Drama
Plot: Life is no bed of roses for 52-year-old Juan "Coco" Villegas. He, who has been a gas station attendant for twenty years in Patagonia, finds himself jobless overnight. He first tries to survive by selling knives of his own making. But business is bad and he can't find real work. One day though, after fixing a vehicle on a farm, he gets paid by means of a ... beautiful Argentinian watch-dog! From this blessed day on, things start shaping well at last..
Awards: 2 wins & 8 nominations
